attributes.magic: PE32+ executable (GUI) x86-64, for MS Windows

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

exiftool.ImageFileCharacteristics: Executable, No line numbers, Large address aware

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET MALWARE Redline Stealer TCP CnC Activity
